## Data Maps and Time Series

- Data Maps:
  - immediately analysing the map versus having understand each methodology, draws the reader's attention promptly

- Time Series:
  - good for large data sets with variability
  - simple passage of time is not a good explanatory variable 
  - time is not always the cause of a trend

## Principles of Graphical Excellence

- Induce the viewer to think about substance
- Well-designed presentation of interesting data
- Clarity, precision, and efficiency are key

- Presents the 
    - greatest amount of ideas,
    - in the shortest time,
    - in the least ink


**"Always tells the truth"**
